success.title: GREAT
success.content: You have successfully purchased your passes

failed.title: OOPS

about.title: ABOUT
about.content: Cozies is an immersive community-driven movement focused on a "cozy" culture of creativity, self-care, and self-discovery. By owning a Cozies, you are making a statement that you are comfortable with who you are, what you own, and where you go. Your Cozies NFT is the key to this journey. Story A group of citizens feel out of place within the FUD-fuelled climate of the city, believing that the technology meant to bring us closer together has resulted in a culture that is only driving us apart. Citizens who wish to break free head to the forgotten Cozy Platform. Awaiting their journey, the motley crew becomes a community that values compassion, self-exploration and mindfulness - The Cozies.

gallery.title: GALLERY
gallery.content: Progress doesn't have a one-size-fits-all meaning. Each Cozies character is looking forward, symbolizing one's path, growth, and the reflective nature of the journey. With each character we also wanted to give a sense of adventure, giving holders an opportunity to craft a story of their own journey.

info.title: COZIES ART
info.content: Inspired by lo-fi anime aesthetics, sci-fi and streetwear culture, each trait is hand-crafted to reflect a futuristic reality. A crucial time when our actions will determine whether it is a dystopian or a utopian one.

list.title: TECH
list.description: Inspired by sci-fi and Web3, the Cozies are decked out with technological marvels and bionic augmentations.

list.title: COZY
list.description: Cozy drip and the ability to express oneself is an essential part of being a Cozy.

list.title: JOURNEY
list.description: Your character is ready for a journey - looking forward and seeking deeper knowledge of the world around, and within.

team.title: TEAM
team.content: Our experienced team will ensure a cozy and exciting journey ahead.

faq.title: FAQ

list.question: What is the size of this collection?
list.answer: The Cozies genesis collection will introduce 10,000 unique characters.

list.question: How are the 10000 Cozies distributed?
list.answer:
a. A select number of Cozies will directly mint a boarding pass (Golden Ticket - 1 per wallet).  Guaranteed mint within the timeframe.

b. Afterwards, Allowlisted Cozies will be eligible for a boarding pass (Allowlist - 2 per wallet).
Qualified premint.xyz addresses can participate on a first come first serve basis. 


c. Remaining for Public Sale (3 per wallet)
Any addresses, including Golden Tickets or Allowlists can participate.

d. 300 of the Cozies will remain with the team for internal growth, incentives and marketing.

list.question: Is there a Discord?
list.answer: The Cozy Platform is currently hidden in a secret location and has limited access. Follow us on Twitter for opportunities to enter it.

list.question: What type of chain and contract do we use?
list.answer: Cozies will arrive to the Ethereum Blockchain post Ethereum mERC-721A

list.question: How do I get an Allowlist spot?
list.answer: All engagement with us is considered. We’re also collaborating with a lot of projects that we resonate with - follow us on Twitter for more opportunities to be allowlisted.

list.question: What intellectual property rights do the Cozies holders receive?
list.answer: A16Z: Non-Exclusive Commercial Rights (Creator Retains Exploitation Rights) & Termination for Hate Speech

faq.note: If you have any question, you can go Twitter or Discord for help!
